Package cams.domain

Class Student

java.lang.Object
cams.user.User
cams.domain.Student
public class Student extends User
The Student entity class represents a student user in the system. It extends the User class and includes additional attributes related to camp registration and enquiries.
Since:
2023-11-09
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gillbert Susilo Wong, Juan Frederick, Karl Devlin Chau, Pascalis Pandey, Trang Nguyen

    • Student

      public Student(String name, String userID, String faculty, String passwordHash)
      Constructs a new Student object with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the student
      userID - the unique user ID of the student
      faculty - the faculty to which the student belongs
      passwordHash - the hashed password of the student
